DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Bronchoscopy and Real- Time Ultrasound Guided Percutaneous Tracheostomy
DOC.detailed_description: Trial is a randomized study to compare between ultrasound guided percutaneous tracheostomy and bronchoscopy guided percutaneous tracheostomy. Patients will be randomly assigned to be submitted to evaluate safety, complication rates, easy to perform , clinical outcomes and effectivity.
DOC.criteria: All intubated and mechanically ventilated patients indicated for a tracheostomy Patients with tracheal or neck abnormalities, soft tissue infection in the neck, neck surgery history, oxygenation problems , coagulation disorders or coagulation parameter changes and those requiring urgent or surgery patients unable to provide informed consent.
